alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 2:54PM AKST until February 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: Snow will develop across the Panhandle from south to north as a weather system moves out of the north Pacific. Snow will start over the Hyder area tonight and persist into Thursday and may begin to mix with rain by the Thursday afternoon. The snow will move northward and begin to affect the northern half or the area early Thursday and last into Friday. An area of enhanced precipitation looks to develop over the northern areas Thursday night. The placement of this enhancement could affect amounts along with temperatures being near or just above freezing. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 11 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet heavy snow will be difficult to move.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
